abilities.name: Rivet Gun
abilities.description: Torbjörn fires a single arcing rivet. Turret targets enemy hit by primary fire. Can headshot.

abilities.name: Rivet Gun (Alt Fire)
abilities.description: Torbjörn ejects molten metal from his gun in a shotgun-like burst. Can headshot

abilities.name: Forge Hammer
abilities.description: This multipurpose hammer repairs turrets and, in a pinch, can also be used as a weapon. While Forge Hammer is equipped, Rivet Gun automatically reloads itself after a short period of time.

abilities.name: Deploy Turret
abilities.description: Torbjörn deploys a self-building turret which automatically tracks and attacks enemies. Turret cannot headshot.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Torbjörn gains additional extra health as well as improved attack, movement, and reload speed. Instantly restores 6 ammo upon activation.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Torbjörn creates pools of molten slag that deal massive, sustained damage (plus bonus damage to armor), and can prevent enemies from moving through key locations.
